# PeerReviewProjectWeek4

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of PeerReviewProjectWeek4 is to summarize and plot data on FARS reports.For more info on the package, look at the vignette.

## Installation

You can install the released version of PeerReviewProjectWeek4 from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("PeerReviewProjectWeek4")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JamesFrech/PeerReviewProjectWeek4")
```
